topicTitle: Harry Sachel aka Dr. Nobody ban request.

posts.postText:
Offender name: Harry Sachel

Offender's Steam ID: STEAM_0:0:17645288

What the Offender did: Countless rdms. It was like 1 rdm PER ROUND, then the map changed. Then Pharaoh banned him for another reason. But he deserves a perm ban. He got banned for 3 days by Pharaoh, but he didn't see the proof I have. And if not, at least remove his vip, if he's going to break server rules, why should he have vip?

Were there any admins on at the time?: Pharaoh

Proof: 
http://i56.tinypic.com/65n148.png
http://i51.tinypic.com/28u1ouc.png
http://i55.tinypic.com/21bm3co.png

These are just three out of the MANY rdms he had.
Honest, police officers, Harry is a good boy. He wouldn't do such thi--   BAN.
